publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1105.1 Derek Brownlee: Spending Review 2007â€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-1105) in the name of Iain Gray, insert at end "notes the decision of the Parliament on 8 November 2007 in relation to a review of the budget process for future years, and calls on all interested parties to participate fully in that review when it commences."
